title: Ticket #3378: Poor error message from condor_release
description:
On a host without a schedd running, if you try to do a "condor_q", you get the following: 

[root@tusker-ce1.tusker ~]# condor_q

-- Failed to fetch ads from: <129.93.227.88:57311> : tusker-ce1.unl.edu
CEDAR:6001:Failed to connect to <129.93.227.88:57311>

However, if you try to do "condor_release": 

[root@tusker-ce1.tusker ~]# condor_release 111

Couldn't find/release all jobs in cluster 111.

Unlike with "condor_q", there's no immediate way to tell the schedd isn't running with the output of "condor_release".
remarks:
2012-Dec-13 14:07:08 by bbockelm:
Same thing with condor_rm and possibly other tools.
creator: bbockelm
